channel.title: Client help
channel.description: I know how to code the server and everything i just need help with the client. Okay i am using http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,401866.0.html The client crashes on me after about 10 feet of walking, if i stand still i wont crash though, any help? Also i need to know how to change the automatic ip of the server to my own.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 22, 2009, 05:45:34 pm[/size][hr]*UPDATE* I figured out how to change the automatic IP, i just need to find out how to stop the crashing of the client now.
